summary: On the Edge is about suicidal patients discovering their true selves while going through therapy in a treatment center.
cast: Martin Carney|Paul Hickey|Camille O'Sullivan|Cillian Murphy|Vincent Walsh|Vinny Murphy|Mary Murray|Gavin Coleman|Patrick Murray|Stephen Rea|Aidan Kelly|John Burke|Anna Manahan|Des Smith|Judy Cameron|Arthur Riordan|Tricia Vessey|Bill Hodnett|Jonathan Jackson|Marcella Plunkett|Tomás Ó Súilleabháin|Simon Delaney|Imelda Andrews|Des Nealon|Gerard McSorley|Eanna MacLiam|Liam Carney|Charlie O'Reilly|Alison Coffey|Alexandra McGuinness|Adrain Washington
title: Al límite
